article.title: L-3 to Install Precision Strike Packages on MC-130W Aircraft
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: L-3 Communications TCS Incorporated, Warner Robins, Georgia, was awarded a $61 million contract to install eight precision strike packages on MC-130W aircraft.Â Warner-Robins Air Logistics Center, Robins Air Force Base, Georgia, is the contracting activity.
